body.p: Use the Highlight tool to mark the text in your document using different colours.
You can find the Highlight option on the main toolbar, in the Edit Review menu, or in the contextual menu of a document, in the Review st of options.
body.note: In case the Highlight tool is not available on your toolbar, enable Author Comments in the contextual menu of the toolbar.
keeps the highlighting of a document between working sessions.
body.p: To watch our video demonstration about using the Highlight tool, go to http://oxygenxml.com/demo/Highlight_Tool.html.
